name: Center Images - For Reals
description:
[ FEATURES ]
On image-only pages:
	- Images are centered, both horizontally and vertically.
	- A border appears when cursor touches image. (Not on SVG images)
	- Transparency-tiles appear when cursor touches PNG, GIF, or ICO images with transparent areas.
	
Compatible with local image-files viewed in browser.
  
[ TEST THE STYLE: ]
	http://imjustcreative.com/wp-content/uploads/1-firefox-logo.jpg Solid image.
	http://www.steelemodelandtalent.com/userfiles/image/FireFox.gif Image with transparencies.
	http://www.arvernes.com/wiki/images/a/a9/Mozilla_Firefox.svg SVG image.
additional_info:
Only tested on Firefox for Windows.
 
[ CHANGELOG ]
July 30. 2012: Now compatible with SVG images! (Thanks user 130258)
November 10, 2011: Everything seems to be all good, still.
June 10, 2009: Compatible with Firefox add-on "Link Alert".
May 25, 2009: Compatible with Firefox 3.5.
